EmailTemplate.name: DRI DYK- Underlying Fund Holders
EmailTemplate.subject: DR Insight Underlying Fund Holders Report
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Underlying Fund Holders Report Would you like to quickly download institutional holders along with underlying fund positions?
Solution: You can easily generate this deliverable in Excel with a few clicks in Ownership within DR Insight.
Click here to access a Quick Guide that will walk you through the process in DR Insight.
For further information or training, please contact your dedicated Account Manager or 24/7 client support by clicking here or the telephone numbers below:
US: 1-800-305-0819 | Europe: +44 (0) 20 7665 9820 | APAC: +852 58082615
